text: Then will he, who is on a clear proof from his Lord and a witness from Him reads it to him, and before it (when) there is the book of Moses, (as) a guide and a mercy, (not believe in the Quran)? They will believe in it. And whoever does not believe in it from among the parties, then the fire is his promised place. So do not be in doubt about it, it is certainly the truth from your Lord but the majority of human beings does not believe
